author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
92x PR of L1T development.  Note: A cherry-picked subset of this PR is the Muon-only PR #19102, 

Number of files changed 59
- 37 source code files
- 22 configuration python files, most not used by default, useful to developers

Contains developments between tag v94.0 and v95.7 from l1t-integration-CMSSW_9_2_0 integration branch. Documented in detail in [twiki](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideL1TOfflineDev#Status_of_Integration) most notably:
- BMTF: improved eta assignment leading to 50% better resolution w.r.t. GEN.  Moved LUTs into L1Trigger/L1TMuon. ( (cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TMuon#11).
- New uGMT extrapolation LUTs 20170505. These take the BMTF eta scale fix into account. This needs the external Muons data. (cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TMuon#10)
- EG - new extended H/E, plus 2nd isolation WP (aka 2016)
- MET Emulator bug fix when getting address using ieta for MET PUS LUT. Emulator was counting from 0, firmware was counting from 1.
- Introduce a new caloParams2017_v1_7 to reflect current online conditions. (cms-data/L1Trigger-L1TCalorimeter#19)
- Saturate MET when there is a saturated ECAL or HCAL TP
- Adds a caloParams_2017_v1_8_2, enabling the 2nd iso EG WP.


With respect to PR #19084, this PR is more complete, and it contains one package less:
BMTF LUTs are moved to the correct directory (L1Trigger/L1TMuon) and code is self-contained in L1Trigger/L1TMuonBarrel package.
title: Pr92x upto l1t integration v95.7
